actions.committee: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to require commercial airlines to make flight delay information available to the public, and for other purposes.
short_title: Air Travel Delay Awareness Act of 2006

summary.text: Air Travel Delay Awareness Act of 2006 - Amends federal transportation law to require air carriers, foreign air carriers, or intrastate air carriers that provide air transportation or intrastate air transportation to passengers to provide flight delay information to the public not later than 10 minutes after such information is available.

titles.title: Air Travel Delay Awareness Act of 2006
A bill to require commercial airlines to make flight delay information available to the public, and for other purposes.
